name: Thrilling Tank Rocket
description:
Thrilling Tank Rocket is the best blitz wargame on play store. Your country has been attacked by your enemy. Fight, shoot and destroy your enemies in various blitz wargame battlefields: cities, industrial zones, deserts, no man's lands... Know the war battlefield and protect your homeland.
Features:
- Stunning and realistic 3D graphics with
- Different real tanks from all around the world
- Different missions and locations: Jungle, Desert, city
- Dynamic lighting and amazing explosion effects.
- Realistic Enemy Tanks AI
